comment: Thank you for giving me motivation to go to gym and teaching me the form ra. Nenu cheyadam cheyyaka povadam vere vishayam.Inka nunchi ayna anni last minute lo kakkunda starting nunchi chey.Room lo manam kalise aade games chala miss avutanu ra. All the best ra. Happy ga undu
name: Srihasa Ogirala
